sect1.para: Below is the list of patches applicable to the NetBSD 1.6.2 release:

itemizedlist.listitem:
A description and resolution procedure for sysctl(3) local denial of service can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-013

A description and resolution procedure for SIOCGIFALIAS ioctl may cause system crash can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-012

A description and resolution procedure for Sendmail race condition can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-010

A description and resolution procedure for False detection of Intel hardware RNG can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-009

A description and resolution procedure for mail(1) creates record file with insecure umask can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-007

A description and resolution procedure for bridge memory disclosure can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-005

A description and resolution procedure for Multiple denial of services issues with racoon can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-003

A description and resolution procedure for settimeofday() time wrap can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-002

A description and resolution procedure for Kernfs kernel memory disclosure can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-001

A description and resolution procedure for ntpd may start with different group id than desired can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-011

A description and resolution procedure for OpenSSL man in the middle can force weak protocol can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-010

A description and resolution procedure for insecure /tmp file usage when building using imake can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-009

A description and resolution procedure for heap memory corruption in FreeBSD compat code can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-008

A description and resolution procedure for multiple vulnerabilities in CVS can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-006

A description and resolution procedure for a buffer overflows in MIT Kerberos 5 telnet client can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-004

A description and resolution procedure for Local DoS via audio device with specific drivers can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-002

A description and resolution procedure for Insufficient argument validation in compat code can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-010

A description and resolution procedure for a ftpd root escalation can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-009

A description and resolution procedure for CVS server vulnerability can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-008

A description and resolution procedure for TCP protocol and implementation vulnerability can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-006

A description and resolution procedure for Denial of service vulnerabilities in OpenSSL can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-005
